channel.title: AI Model Deprecations
channel.description: RSS feed tracking deprecations across major AI providers

item.title: OpenAI: gpt-4o-realtime-preview-2024-10-01
item.description:
Announced: 2025-06-10 | Shutdown: 2025-06-10
On June 10th, 2025, we notified developers using gpt-4o-realtime-preview-2024-10-01 of its deprecation and removal from the API in three months. SHUTDOWN DATE MODEL / SYSTEM RECOMMENDED REPLACEMENT 2025-09-10 gpt-4o-realtime-preview-2024-10-01 gpt-4o-realtime-preview

item.title: OpenAI to deprecate gpt-4o-audio-preview-2024-10-01
item.description:
Announced: 2025-06-10 | Shutdown: 2025-09-10
OpenAI will deprecate the gpt-4o-audio-preview-2024-10-01 model and replace it with the gpt-4o-audio-preview model. Shutdown date: 2025-09-10.

item.title: OpenAI to deprecate text-moderation models
item.description:
Announced: 2025-04-28 | Shutdown: 2025-10-27
OpenAI will deprecate the text-moderation-007, text-moderation-stable, and text-moderation-latest models, replacing them with the omni-moderation model. Shutdown date: 2025-10-27.

item.title: OpenAI to deprecate o1-preview and o1-mini models
item.description:
Announced: 2025-04-28 | Shutdown: 2025-07-28
OpenAI will deprecate the o1-preview model in 3 months and the o1-mini model in 6 months, replacing them with the o3 and o4-mini models respectively. Shutdown dates: 2025-07-28 and 2025-10-27.

item.title: OpenAI to Deprecate GPT-4.5 Preview
item.description:
Announced: 2025-04-14 | Shutdown: 2025-07-14
OpenAI will be removing the gpt-4.5-preview model from the API, with recommended replacement of gpt-4.1.

item.title: OpenAI Assistants API v1 Beta Discontinued
item.description:
Announced: 2024-10-02 | Shutdown: 2024-12-18
OpenAI is discontinuing access to the v1 beta of the Assistants API, with v2 beta as the recommended replacement.

item.title: OpenAI Deprecates Fine-tuning on Babbage-002 and Davinci-002
item.description:
Announced: 2024-08-29 | Shutdown: 2024-10-28
OpenAI will no longer support new fine-tuning training on the babbage-002 and davinci-002 models, with gpt-4o-mini as the recommended replacement.

item.title: OpenAI to Deprecate GPT-4 Models in June 2025
item.description:
Announced: 2024-06-06 | Shutdown: 2025-06-06
OpenAI will deprecate the GPT-4-32K and GPT-4 Vision Preview models on June 6, 2025. Existing users can continue using these models until then. Recommended replacement is the GPT-4o model.

item.title: OpenAI Deprecating GPT-3.5 Turbo Models in September 2024
item.description:
Announced: 2023-11-06 | Shutdown: 2024-09-13
OpenAI is deprecating the GPT-3.5-Turbo-0613 and GPT-3.5-Turbo-16k-0613 models on September 13, 2024. Existing users can continue using these models until then. Recommended replacement is the updated GPT-3.5-Turbo model.

item.title: OpenAI Shutting Down Legacy Fine-Tuning Endpoint in January 2024
item.description:
Announced: 2023-08-22 | Shutdown: 2024-01-04
OpenAI is shutting down the /v1/fine-tunes API and legacy fine-tuned models on January 4, 2024. You must use the new /v1/fine_tuning/jobs endpoint for fine-tuning going forward.

item.title: OpenAI to retire GPT-3 and text embeddings
item.description:
Announced: 2023-07-06 | Shutdown: 2024-01-04
OpenAI will retire older GPT-3 and GPT-3.5 models on January 4, 2024, as well as their first-generation text embedding models.

item.title: OpenAI to update chat models in 2024
item.description:
Announced: 2023-06-13 | Shutdown: 2024-06-13
OpenAI will retire three original chat model versions in June 2024, with only existing users able to continue using them after January 10, 2024.

item.title: OpenAI to retire Codex models on March 23
item.description:
Announced: 2023-03-20 | Shutdown: 2023-03-23
OpenAI will retire the code-davinci-002, code-davinci-001, code-cushman-002, and code-cushman-001 Codex models on March 23, 2023.

item.title: OpenAI Deprecating Legacy Endpoints
item.description:
Announced: 2022-06-03 | Shutdown: 2022-12-03
OpenAI is deprecating legacy API endpoints /v1/engines, /v1/search, /v1/classifications, and /v1/answers on 2022-12-03. Recommended replacements are provided.

item.title: Anthropic Deprecating claude-1.0 Model
item.description:
Announced: 2024-09-04 | Shutdown: 2024-11-06
Anthropic is deprecating the claude-1.0 model on 2024-09-04 and retiring it on 2024-11-06.

item.title: Anthropic Deprecating claude-1.1 Model
item.description:
Announced: 2024-09-04 | Shutdown: 2024-11-06
Anthropic is deprecating the claude-1.1 model on 2024-09-04 and retiring it on 2024-11-06.

item.title: Anthropic deprecates claude-1.2
item.description:
Announced: 2024-09-04 | Shutdown: 2024-11-06
Anthropic is retiring the claude-1.2 model on November 6, 2024 after it was deprecated on September 4, 2024.

item.title: Anthropic deprecates claude-1.3
item.description:
Announced: 2024-09-04 | Shutdown: 2024-11-06
Anthropic is retiring the claude-1.3 model on November 6, 2024 after it was deprecated on September 4, 2024.

item.title: Anthropic deprecates claude-instant-1.0
item.description:
Announced: 2024-09-04 | Shutdown: 2024-11-06
Anthropic is retiring the claude-instant-1.0 model on November 6, 2024 after it was deprecated on September 4, 2024.

item.title: Anthropic Deprecates claude-instant-1.1
item.description:
Announced: 2024-09-04 | Shutdown: 2024-11-06
Anthropic is deprecating the claude-instant-1.1 AI model on September 4, 2024 and retiring it on November 6, 2024.

item.title: Anthropic Deprecates claude-instant-1.2
item.description:
Announced: 2024-09-04 | Shutdown: 2024-11-06
Anthropic is deprecating the claude-instant-1.2 AI model on September 4, 2024 and retiring it on November 6, 2024.

item.title: Anthropic Deprecates claude-2.0
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-21 | Shutdown: 2025-07-21
Anthropic is deprecating the claude-2.0 AI model on January 21, 2025 and retiring it on July 21, 2025.

item.title: Anthropic: claude-2.1 Deprecated & Retired
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-21 | Shutdown: 2025-07-21
The Anthropic model claude-2.1 was deprecated on January 21, 2025 and retired on July 21, 2025.

item.title: Anthropic: claude-3-sonnet-20240229 Deprecated & Retired
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-21 | Shutdown: 2025-07-21
The Anthropic model claude-3-sonnet-20240229 was deprecated on January 21, 2025 and retired on July 21, 2025.

item.title: Google Vertex AI Gemini Models Deprecated
item.description: Starting April 29, 2025, Gemini 1.5 Pro and Gemini 1.5 Flash models will be unavailable in new Google Vertex AI projects.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Ai21 J2 Mid-v1 Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2024-10-04 | Shutdown: 2025-03-12
Ai21 J2 Mid-v1 model will enter legacy status on 2024-10-04 in us-east-1, and reach end-of-life on 2025-03-12 in us-east-1. Recommended replacement: ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Ai21 J2 Ultra-v1 Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2024-10-04 | Shutdown: 2025-03-12
Ai21 J2 Ultra-v1 model will enter legacy status on 2024-10-04 in us-east-1, and reach end-of-life on 2025-03-12 in us-east-1. Recommended replacement: ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Ai21 J2-Grande-Instruct Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2024-10-04 | Shutdown: 2025-03-12
Ai21 J2-Grande-Instruct model will enter legacy status on 2024-10-04 in us-east-1, and reach end-of-life on 2025-03-12 in us-east-1. Recommended replacement: ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Ai21 J2 Jumbo-Instruct Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2024-10-04 | Shutdown: 2025-03-12
Ai21 J2 Jumbo-Instruct model will enter legacy status on 2024-10-04 (us-east-1) and reach end-of-life on 2025-03-12 (us-east-1). Recommended replacement: ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Stable Diffusion XL 1.0 Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2024-10-16 | Shutdown: 2025-05-20
Stable Diffusion XL 1.0 model will enter legacy status on 2024-10-16 (us-east-1, us-west-2) and reach end-of-life on 2025-05-20 (us-east-1, us-west-2). Recommended replacements: stability.stable-image-core-v1:0, stability.stable-image-ultra-v1:0, and stability.sd3-large-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Claude v2 Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-21 | Shutdown: anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022-v2:0, anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620-v1:0, or anthropic.claude-3-5-haiku-20241022-v1:0
Claude v2 model will enter legacy status on 2025-01-21 (all regions) and reach end-of-life on anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022-v2:0, anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620-v1:0, or anthropic.claude-3-5-haiku-20241022-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Claude v2.1 Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-21 | Shutdown: anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022-v2:0, anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620-v1:0, or anthropic.claude-3-5-haiku-20241022-v1:0
Model Claude v2.1 entered legacy status on January 21, 2025 and will reach end-of-life on anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022-v2:0, anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620-v1:0, or anthropic.claude-3-5-haiku-20241022-v1:0

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Claude Instant Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-21 | Shutdown: anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022-v2:0, anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620-v1:0, or anthropic.claude-3-5-haiku-20241022-v1:0
Model Claude Instant entered legacy status on January 21, 2025 and will reach end-of-life on anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022-v2:0, anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620-v1:0, or anthropic.claude-3-5-haiku-20241022-v1:0

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Claude 3 Opus Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2025-07-15 | Shutdown: anthropic.claude-opus-4-1-20250805-v1:0, anthropic.claude-opus-4-20250514-v1:0, anthropic.claude-sonnet-4-20250514-v1:0
Model Claude 3 Opus entered legacy status on July 15, 2025 and will reach end-of-life on anthropic.claude-opus-4-1-20250805-v1:0, anthropic.claude-opus-4-20250514-v1:0, anthropic.claude-sonnet-4-20250514-v1:0

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Claude 3 Sonnet Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-21 | Shutdown: 2024-10-22, 2024-06-20, 2024-10-22
The Claude 3 Sonnet model on AWS Bedrock will enter legacy status on January 21, 2025 in certain regions, with end-of-life scheduled for dates in 2024.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Stability Image Core v1 Retirement
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-31 | Shutdown: 2025-09-04
Stability Image Core v1 model on AWS Bedrock will enter legacy status on January 31, 2025 and reach end-of-life on September 4, 2025. Recommended replacement: stability.stable-image-core-v1:1.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Stability 3 Large Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-31 | Shutdown: 2025-09-04
The Stability 3 Large model on AWS Bedrock will enter legacy status on January 31, 2025 and reach end-of-life on September 4, 2025. Recommended replacement: stability.sd3-5-large-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Stability Image Ultra v1 Deprecated
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-31 | Shutdown: 2025-09-04
Stability Image Ultra v1 model is entering legacy status on 2025-01-31 and will reach end-of-life on 2025-09-04. Recommended replacement: stability.stable-image-ultra-v1:1.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: AI21 Jamba-Instruct Deprecated
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-31 | Shutdown: 2025-08-01
AI21 Jamba-Instruct model is entering legacy status on 2025-01-31 and will reach end-of-life on 2025-08-01. Recommended replacements: ai21.jamba-1-5-mini-v1:0 or ai21.jamba-1-5-large-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Amazon Titan Text G1 - Premier Deprecated
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-31 | Shutdown: 2025-08-15
Amazon Titan Text G1 - Premier model is entering legacy status on 2025-01-31 and will reach end-of-life on 2025-08-15. Recommended replacement: amazon.nova-pro-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Titan Text G1 - Express Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-31 | Shutdown: 2025-08-15
Amazon Titan Text G1 - Express model will enter legacy status on 2025-01-31 and reach end-of-life on 2025-08-15. Recommended replacement is amazon.nova-micro-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Titan Text G1 - Lite Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-31 | Shutdown: 2025-08-15
Amazon Titan Text G1 - Lite model will enter legacy status on 2025-01-31 and reach end-of-life on 2025-08-15. Recommended replacement is amazon.nova-lite-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Titan Image Generator G1 V1 Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2025-01-31 | Shutdown: 2025-08-15
Amazon Titan Image Generator G1 V1 model will enter legacy status on 2025-01-31 and reach end-of-life on 2025-08-15. Recommended replacement is amazon.nova-canvas-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock Deprecating Stable Diffusion XL 0.8
item.description:
Announced: 2024-02-02 | Shutdown: 2024-04-30
Stable Diffusion XL 0.8 model will reach end-of-life on April 30, 2024. Recommended replacement: stability.stable-diffusion-xl-v1.

item.title: AWS Bedrock Deprecating Cohere Command
item.description:
Announced: 2024-10-04 | Shutdown: 2025-08-12
Cohere Command model will reach end-of-life on August 12, 2025. Recommended replacements: cohere.command-r-v1:0 and cohere.command-r-plus-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock Deprecating Cohere Command Light
item.description:
Announced: 2024-10-04 | Shutdown: 2025-08-12
Cohere Command Light model will reach end-of-life on August 12, 2025. Recommended replacements: cohere.command-r-v1:0 and cohere.command-r-plus-v1:0.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Model Claude v1.3 Deprecated
item.description:
Announced: 2023-11-28 | Shutdown: 2024-02-28
AWS Bedrock is deprecating Model Claude v1.3. It will enter legacy status on November 28, 2023 and reach end-of-life on February 28, 2024. Recommended replacement: anthropic.claude-v2:1

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Titan Embeddings - Text v1.1 Deprecated
item.description:
Announced: 2023-11-07 | Shutdown: 2024-02-15
AWS Bedrock is deprecating Model Titan Embeddings - Text v1.1. It will enter legacy status on November 7, 2023 and reach end-of-life on February 15, 2024. Recommended replacement: amazon.titan-embed-text-v1

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Meta Llama 2 13b-chat-v1 Deprecated
item.description:
Announced: 2024-05-12 | Shutdown: 2024-10-30
AWS Bedrock is deprecating Model Meta Llama 2 13b-chat-v1. It will enter legacy status on May 12, 2024 and reach end-of-life on October 30, 2024. Recommended replacement: meta.llama3-1-8b-instruct-v1

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Meta Llama 2 70b-chat-v1 Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2024-05-12 | Shutdown: 2024-10-30
Meta Llama 2 70b-chat-v1 model is entering legacy status on 2024-05-12 and will reach end-of-life on 2024-10-30. Recommended replacement: meta.llama3-1-70b-instruct-v1.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Meta Llama 2-13b Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2024-05-12 | Shutdown: 2024-10-30
Meta Llama 2-13b model is entering legacy status on 2024-05-12 and will reach end-of-life on 2024-10-30. Recommended replacement: meta.llama3-8b-instruct-v1.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Meta Llama 2-70b Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2024-05-12 | Shutdown: 2024-10-30
Meta Llama 2-70b model is entering legacy status on 2024-05-12 and will reach end-of-life on 2024-10-30. Recommended replacement: meta.llama3-70b-instruct-v1.

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Ai21 J2 Mid-v1 Deprecated
item.description:
Announced: 2024-04-30 | Shutdown: 2024-10-04
Model Ai21 J2 Mid-v1 will reach end-of-life in us-west-2 on October 4, 2024. Recommended replacement is ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0 in US East (N. Virginia).

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Ai21 J2 Ultra-v1 Deprecated
item.description:
Announced: 2024-04-30 | Shutdown: 2024-10-04
Model Ai21 J2 Ultra-v1 will reach end-of-life in us-west-2 on October 4, 2024. Recommended replacement is ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0 in US East (N. Virginia).

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Ai21 J2-Grande-Instruct Deprecated
item.description:
Announced: 2024-04-30 | Shutdown: 2024-10-04
Model Ai21 J2-Grande-Instruct will reach end-of-life in us-west-2 on October 4, 2024. Recommended replacement is ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0 in US East (N. Virginia).

item.title: AWS Bedrock: Ai21 J2 Jumbo-Instruct Model Deprecation
item.description:
Announced: 2024-04-30 | Shutdown: 2024-10-04
The Ai21 J2 Jumbo-Instruct model will enter legacy status on April 30, 2024 in the us-west-2 region, and reach end-of-life on October 4, 2024. The recommended replacement is ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0 in the US East (N. Virginia) region.

item.title: No Cohere API Deprecations Found
item.description: No deprecation content found for Cohere API.
